metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9574 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
nss before version 3.30 is vulnerable to a remote denial of service during the session handshake when using SessionTicket extension and ECDHE-ECDSA.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9574` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnss3 - 2:3.26.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
libnss3-1d - 2:3.26.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
libnss3-nssdb - 2:3.26.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
libnss3-tools - 2:3.26.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> CVE is assigned to steps leading to crash in 3.21 series

criterions.comment: nss package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:3.26.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2').
